oh sxxt! it fixing to get us! its fixing to get us! im going through the woods." next i turn around and look then say, ahh aahhh. i was trembing with fear at what i saw and couldnt say anything. what i saw was the bright star like object coming at us with a white beam\light on the ground. i grab him from running through the bushes and tell him, "hell nawl, we are togethter." in less then a second the light was from the corner of my steet to about 20feet from us. by then he bolts and take off running full speed to the house. i follow behind running for my life. neiher one of us looked back. when we went back up the road with more people. the 2 obeject were still in the sky where we first notice them. it is now around 6:22 we go out stay till about 7:40. then we notice both object were gone.
